discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
When the client doesn't yet have an IP address (or know the DHCP server's address), it sends the DHCP Discover message as a broadcast.

questions.question_text: Which of the following traffic types does a DHCP Discover request from a PC use?

choices.A: The PoE power budget is exceeded.
choices.D: The Ethernet cable is not working.

questions.question_text: A user’s VoIP phone and workstation are connected through an inline cable. The user reports that the VoIP phone intermittently reboots, but the workstation is not having any network-related issues. Which of the following is the most likely cause?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Each PoE switch has a limited power budget. If multiple devices connected to the switch exceed that budget, it can cause some devices to intermittently reboot, especially power-hungry devices like VoIP phones.

Selected Answer: C
cAUSE the boys said so

Selected Answer: A
This could be A or C but I it's looking for A. Quality of Service and Load balancing can both work to decongest an environment, load balancing by disrupting traffic and QoS by 
assigning priority to traffic in order to organize it.

Selected Answer: C
The network is experiencing high latency and packet loss during peak hours, which suggests network congestion. The best solution is to prioritize critical traffic using Quality of Service (QoS).

questions.question_text: A company’s network is experiencing high latency and packet loss during peak hours. Network monitoring tools show increased traffic on a switch. Which of the following should a network technician implement to reduce the network congestion and improve performance?
Which of the following VPN types provides secure remote access to the network resources through a web portal?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
A clientless VPN allows users to connect to a network securely using a web browser without needing to install any dedicated VPN software on their device, essentially accessing network resources through a web portal

questions.question_text: Which of the following best explains the role of confidentiality with regard to data at rest?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Confidentiality for data at rest means that access is restricted and controlled, and only those with the necessary authorization (privileged access) can view or modify the data.

Selected Answer: C
Data can be accessed after priviledged access is granted.

choices.A: Data can be accessed by anyone on the administrative network.
choices.C: Data can be accessed after privileged access is granted.
choices.D: Data can be accessed after verifying the hash.
choices.B: Data can be accessed remotely with proper training.
